trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 31st 1986
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were attending a Neil Diamond concert Hot August Nights at the Greek Theaterb in Hollywood An outdoor Ampitheatre It was a soldout audience Thousands of people were there Neil Diamond was singing is song HeartLight They were flashing lazer beams in the air in front of the stage I then saw people looking up and pointing I looked up About 200 or 300 ft above the stage was a large Disc with varius colored lights The lights They were diffused and they were moving in waves blending with each other At first I thought it was part of the show Then it slowly started acsending straight up Every body was ooing and ahing It picked up speed and after a couple of minutes was out of sight The Press was there and taking pictures It was being Video taped for commercial production Someone must have gotten pictures Audiences are not to bring cameras to Concerts I think this sighting could easily be investigated by MUFON Jim Mcguire
